goals__remit: Nomura is a leading financial services group and Asia-based investment bank with worldwide reach, providing a broad range of innovative solutions tailored to the specific requirements of individual, institutional, corporate and government clients through an international network. We are based in Tokyo with regional headquarters in Hong Kong, London, and New York. In the EU we are a significant inward investor and have a presence in 10 EU Member States.
